availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: New Castle post office, Henry County, KY. Born in Henry County, Kentucky, son of Waller Webb and Hannah Young. Married Levia Ann Gist. A Kentucky-born farmer.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle post office, p. 88.

Find A Grave, Entry for Isaac Newton Webb (1817-1882), Find A Grave Memorial # 86134171, New Castle Cemetery, New Castle, Henry County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=WEB&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=1201&GRid=86134171& (accessed 16 June 2017).
